resources.string: California based fast food chain that serves delicious burgers, fries, and shakes.
Seattle based coffee shop chain that serves coffee, snacks, free Wi-Fi.
Restaurant chain that serves a wide variety of breakfast foods, as well as lunch and dinner platters.
Local bakery that specializes in Hispanic pastries and offers other baked goods.
Classic fast food chain known for its burgers and fries.
Local Latin American restaurant chain that specializes in seafood.
Free parking. Cable TV. Air conditioning. Bilingual staff. What\'s not to love?
A family friend beauty salon that specializes in women\'s beauty.
A city park with a sports center, swim stadium, playgrounds, and other recreations.
A Los Angeles Public Library that carries a wide variety of books and hosts many book related events.
Discount goods chain that carries a wide variety of items including household supplies, beauty products, stationary, and more.
Supermarket chain that carries produce, dairy, meat,and other grocery items.
A small local hardware store that carries home improvement supplies.
A store known for its selection of men\'s vintage clothing. They have a small selection of items for women.
A shopping center containing many well known store and restaurant chains. Seasonal events are hosted here from time to time.
Part of a well known convenience store chain. This particular store is open 24/7.
Part of a movie theater chain. This location has 20 viewing rooms.
A small park near a busy street. There is a small outdoor playground for children.
This gym offers a comfortable workout environment and affordable membership plans.
This sports center has a gym, a swimming pool, a basketball gym, and much more.
An authorized shipping center that uses FedEx, UPS, and many other shipping services. They offer many other services including fax services, copy and printing services, and much more.
A small gas station. There is a small food mart that sells snacks and drinks.
This place offers affordable car wash services, each with a free vacuum service.
A small auto repair shop that offers tune-ups, smog checks, and much more.
